site.admin.dashboard.title: Admin
site.account.dashboard.title: Account
site.account.sign_up.form.title: Sign up
site.account.sign_up.form.choose_passwor: You'll be able to choose your password after verifying your email address.
site.account.sign_up.form.sign_up_disabl: Sign up is disabled for this application.
site.account.sign_up.thank_you.title: Thank you
site.account.sign_up.thank_you.message: Your account details have been registered and an email containing an account verification link has been sent to {user_email}.
Your account details have been registered and an email containing an account verification link has been sent to you.
site.account.verify.flash.success: Your account has been successfully verified.
site.account.verify.form.title: Account verification
site.account.verify.form.error_message: If your verification link has expired {link('sign up again', 'account.sign_up')} using the same email address and we'll send you a new one.
site.account.verify.form.no_token_messag: Create an account using the {link('sign up form', 'account.sign_up')} and we'll send you a link to verify your account.
site.account.verify.form.verify_message: Use the form below to choose a password and we can verify your account.
site.account.verify.form.choose_password: Use this password and verify account
site.account.verify.success.title: Account verified
site.account.verify.success.message: Your account has been successfully verified and is now awaiting manual activation.
Once your account is activated you'll receive an email and will be able to sign in.
site.account.sign_in.flash.no_more_recov: You've run out of recovery codes.
We recommend {link('generating new ones', 'account.totp.recovery_codes')} as soon as you can.
site.account.sign_in.flash.low_recovery_: You're running low on recovery codes.
We recommend {link('generating new ones', 'account.totp.recovery_codes')} as soon as you can.
site.account.sign_in.flash.totp_if_devic: If you've lost your authentication device {link('disable two-factor authentication', 'account.totp.disable')} to avoid getting locked out of your account.
site.account.sign_in.flash.consider_totp: Please consider {link('setting up two-factor authentication', 'account.totp.setup')} to help secure your account even further.
site.account.sign_in.form.title: Sign in
site.account.sign_in.form.sign_in_with_m: Sign in with a magic link
site.account.sign_in.magic_link.title: Sign in
site.account.sign_in.magic_link.error_me: If your sign in link has expired {link('sign in again', 'account.sign_in')} using the same email address and we'll send you a new one.
site.account.sign_in.magic_link.no_token: Sign in using the {link('sign in form', 'account.sign_in')} and we'll send you a link to verify your identity.
site.account.sign_in.magic_link.click_bu: Click on the sign in button below if you aren't automatically redirected.
site.account.sign_in.magic_link_sent.mes: We've sent a magic link to your email address that you can use to access your account.
It will expire in {t('time.display_duration', ttl)} and can only be used once.
We've sent a magic link to your email address that you can use to access your account.
It will expire shortly and can only be used once.
site.account.sign_in.recovery_code.title: Sign in with recovery code
site.account.sign_in.recovery_code.messa: Please verify your identity by entering one of your recovery codes. Once a recovery code has been used it can't be used again.
site.account.sign_in.passcode.title: Sign in with passcode
site.account.sign_in.passcode.sms_instru: Please verify your identity by entering the 6 digit passcode that has been generated and sent to your registered phone number.
site.account.sign_in.passcode.app_instru: Please verify your identity by entering a 6 digit passcode that has been generated by your authenticator app.
site.account.reset_password.flash.passwo: Your password has been successfully changed.
site.account.reset_password.email_sent.m: Please check your email for a link to update your password.
site.account.change_password.flash.passw: Your password has been successfully changed.
site.account.change_password.title: Change password
site.account.change_password.insecure_pa: The password you're currently using appears {t('number', known_breach_count)} times in a {link('database of security breaches', 'https://haveibeenpwned.com')} and isn't considered to be secure.
We recommend that you change it to a more secure one as soon as possible.
site.account.change_password.also_consid: Also consider {link('setting up two-factor authentication', 'account.totp.setup')} to help secure your account even further.
site.account.choose_password.flash.passw: Your password has been successfully set.
site.account.choose_password.title: Choose password
site.account.choose_password.allow_direc: Choosing a password will allow you to sign in directly through the {link('sign in form', 'account.sign_in')}.
site.account.choose_password.totp_requir: It's also a requirement for setting up two-factor authentication. This is because if you decide to disable two-factor authentication later on we'll need to verify your identity by asking you for your password.
site.account.totp.flash.password_require: You need to choose a password before you can setup two-factor authentication.
site.account.totp.flash.disabled: Two-factor authentication has been disabled for your account.
site.account.totp.flash.passcode_sms_sen: A passcode has been sent to your registered phone number.
site.account.totp.disable.verify.title: Disable two-factor authentication
site.account.totp.disable.verify.totp_re: Two-factor authentication is required and can't be disabled.
site.account.totp.disable.verify.enter_p: Enter your password to verify your identity and disable two-factor authentication.
site.account.totp.disable.success.title: Two-factor authentication disabled
site.account.totp.disable.success.text: Two-factor authentication has been disabled for your account.
From now on you won't be required to provide any passcodes when logging in to your account.
site.account.totp.disable.already_disabl: Two-factor authentication is already disabled for your account.
site.account.totp.recovery_codes.regener: Your previous recovery codes are no longer valid.
Please download, print, copy, or photograph your new recovery codes and store them in a safe place separate from your authentication device.

If possible, we recommend storing them in a password manager, such as {link('1Password', 'https://1password.com/')}, {link('LastPass', 'https://www.lastpass.com/')}, or {link('Keeper', 'https://www.keepersecurity.com')}.
If you'd like to generate new recovery codes you'll need to verify your identity by entering a valid passcode in the form below.
You do not have any recovery codes. Please use the form below to generate new ones.
If you choose to generate new recovery codes your previous ones will no longer be valid and you won't be able to use them.
site.account.totp.recovery_codes.setup_r: Two-factor authentication has not been setup for your account, so you do not have any recovery codes.
site.account.totp.reset.form.title: Reset two-factor authentication
site.account.totp.reset.form.text: Enter your password in the form below to reset two-factor authentication for your account.
site.account.totp.reset.verify.title: Reset two-factor authentication request
site.account.totp.reset.verify.text: If you're locked out of your account because you've lost access to your authentication device you can use the form below to request two-factor authentication be reset for your account.
After verifying your email address your case will need to be manually reviewed.
If the person reviewing your case believes it to be a legitimate request you'll be sent another link by email to reset two-factor authentication.
site.account.totp.reset.verify.send_veri: I understand, send a verification link
site.account.totp.reset.request.title: Reset two-factor authentication request
site.account.totp.reset.request.text: Requesting a two-factor authentication reset requires a manual review of your case, and could take a while to complete.
If the person reviewing your case believes it to be legitimate you will receive another email with a link to reset two-factor authentication for your account.
site.account.totp.reset.request.reset_bu: I understand, request a two-factor authentication reset
site.account.totp.reset.request_sent.tex: A request for two-factor authentication to be reset for your account has been sent.
Please be patient as your request will have to be manually reviewed.
If the person reviewing your case believes it to be a legitimate request you'll be sent another link by email to reset two-factor authentication.
site.account.totp.reset.email_sent.title: Email sent
site.account.totp.reset.email_sent.text: Please check your email for a link to verify your email address and request a two-factor authentication reset.
Two-factor authentication has already been enabled for your account.
site.account.totp.setup.methods.title: Setup two-factor authentication
site.account.totp.setup.methods.text: Two-factor authentication adds an additional layer of security to your account by requiring more than just your password to sign in.
site.account.totp.setup.methods.app_sms_: You can either use two-factor authentication through an app on your phone or computer, or you can use SMS.
site.account.totp.setup.methods.app_choi: Use an app on your phone or computer to get passcodes when prompted {bold('(recommended)')}.
site.account.totp.setup.methods.sms_choi: We'll send you an SMS message with a passcode when prompted (only use this if you can't use an app).
site.account.totp.setup.methods.app_only: You can use two-factor authentication through an app on your phone or computer.
site.account.totp.setup.app.title: Setup using an app
site.account.totp.setup.app.recommendati: If you don't already have an authenticator app installed on your phone or computer then you'll need to download and install one to setup two-factor authentication.
We recommend using one of the following:
site.account.totp.setup.app.cannot_use_a: {link(`Can't install an authenticator app? Click here to use SMS.`, 'account.totp.setup.sms')}
site.account.totp.setup.app.scan_qr_code: Use your authenticator app to scan the QR code below. If you can't scan the QR code then you can manually enter the secret key below instead.
site.account.totp.setup.app.scan_on_mult: Consider scanning the QR code on multiple devices if you can. If you setup two-factor authentication on multiple devices you'll be less likely to get locked out of your account if you lose a device.
site.account.totp.setup.app.enter_verifi: After scanning the QR code, or manually entering the secret key, your app will display a 6 digit passcode that you can enter below to verify your authenticator app is setup correctly.
site.account.totp.setup.sms.title: Setup using SMS
site.account.totp.setup.sms.warning_text: Using SMS for two-factor authentication is only recommended when you can't use an authenticator app on your phone.
{link(`Don't want to use SMS? Click here to use an app.`, 'account.totp.setup.app')}
site.account.totp.setup.sms.instruction_: Enter the phone number that you'd like to use below and we'll send you a passcode to verify your phone number has been entered correctly.
site.account.totp.setup.sms.send_passcod: Use this phone number and send a passcode
site.account.totp.setup.sms_verify.title: Verify your setup
site.account.totp.setup.sms_verify.warni: Using SMS for two-factor authentication is only recommended when you can't use an authenticator app on your phone.
{link(`Don't want to use SMS? Click here to use an app.`, 'account.totp.setup.app')}
site.account.totp.setup.sms_verify.instr: Enter the 6 digit passcode you received via SMS to verify that phone number is setup correctly.
site.account.totp.setup.activate.title: Recovery codes
site.account.totp.setup.activate.text: Two-factor authentication has not been enabled yet.
Once two-factor authentication has been enabled you'll be required to provide a 6 digit passcode to verify your identity when logging in.
In the event that you lose access to your authentication device you can use the following recovery codes in place of a normal passcode.
site.account.totp.setup.activate.save_re: Before enabling two-factor authentication, please download, print, copy, or photograph your recovery codes and store them in a safe place separate from your authentication device.

If possible, we recommend storing them in a password manager, such as {link('1Password', 'https://1password.com/')}, {link('LastPass', 'https://www.lastpass.com/')}, or {link('Keeper', 'https://www.keepersecurity.com')}.
site.account.totp.setup.activate.saved_r: I have saved my recovery codes
site.account.totp.setup.success.title: Two-factor authentication enabled
site.account.totp.setup.success.text: Two-factor authentication has been enabled for your account.
From now on when logging in you'll be required to provide a 6 digit passcode to verify your identity.
site.account.role_management.list.title: Role management
site.account.role_management.new.title: Add role
site.account.role_management.edit.title: Editing {role_name}
site.account.role_management.delete.user: {user_count} users currently have this role; deleting will remove it from all of them.
{user_count} user currently has this role; deleting will remove it from them.
site.account.role_management.delete.are_: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the role {role_name}?
site.account.user_management.flash.invit: An invite to verify an account has been sent to {email}.
site.account.user_management.flash.totp_: Two-factor authentication reset request approved for {email}.
Two-factor authentication reset request denied for {email}.
site.account.user_management.list.title: User management
site.account.user_management.activate.ar: Are you sure you want to activate {user_email}?
site.account.user_management.review_totp: This is a request to reset two-factor authentication for the account associated with {user_email}.
A user might make this request if they're locked out of their account; they might've lost their authentication device, for example.
Allowing the person making this request to reset two-factor authentication will leave the account less secure overall, but will allow them to sign in again.
Only approve this request if you're sure it's legitimate, otherwise deny it.
site.account.user_management.approve_tot: Are you sure you want to send a link to {user_email} that would allow them to reset two-factor authentication?
site.account.user_management.deny_totp_r: Are you sure you want to deny this request?
site.account.user_management.new.title: Invite user
site.account.user_management.new.invite_: Create user and send invite email
site.account.user_management.edit.title: Editing {user_email}
site.account.user_management.edit.editin: Any changes you make here may affect your current browsing session, so be careful to avoid making any changes you're unsure of.
site.account.user_management.edit.not_ve: This account has not yet been verified.
site.account.user_management.edit.give_s: I want to give this user the super role
Once a user has been given the super role it {italic(`can't be removed`)}.
Please think carefully about whether this is actually what you need to do, or whether another role would be more appropriate.
I understand this {bold(`can't be undone`)}, give this user the super role
site.account.user_management.edit.grant_: Grants and denials allow you to make fine-grained changes to a user's access level by overriding specific permissions after a user's roles have been applied.
Grants are used to give users additional permissions, and denials are used to take specific permissions away.
site.account.user_management.suspend.sus: This user was suspended on {t('time.display_date_time', suspended_at)}
site.account.user_management.suspend.war: Once a user has been suspended they won't be able to sign in again, and if they're already signed in they'll be forcibly signed out.
site.account.user_management.suspend.no_: You do not have permission to suspend users.
site.system.setup.title: Setup
site.system.setup.account_section_descri: We'll create an admin account using the email and password you enter below.
site.system.config.title: System configuration
site.system.config.dmarc_spf_misaligned_: Your SMTP envelope email and system email domains do not match and may cause DMARC check failures.
This could result in emails sent from the system to be marked as unverified, and depending on the DMARC policy, rejected, or quarantined.
site.system.config.enable_auto_account_a: Enable automatic account activation on sign up
site.system.config.enable_magic_link_sig: allows magic link sign up when sign up is enabled
site.system.config.enable_google_sign_in: allows Google sign up when sign up is enabled
site.system.config.enable_facebook_sign_: allows Facebook sign up when sign up is enabled
site.system.config.resend_api_key_hint: {required_length} character API key beginning with re_
site.system.config.twilio_sid_hint: {required_length} character API SID beginning with AC

pwa.account.sign_in.form.sign_in_with_ma: Sign in with a magic link

pwa.account.sign_in.magic_link.text: Please enter the sign in code we've sent to your email address below.
pwa.account.sign_in.magic_link.code_expi: If your sign in code has expired you can try requesting a new one.

pwa.account.sign_in.totp.instruction_tex: Please verify your identity by entering the 6 digit passcode that has been generated and sent to your registered phone number.
Please verify your identity by entering a 6 digit passcode that has been generated by your authenticator app.
pwa.account.sign_in.totp_required.text: Two-factor authentication is required to use this application.
pwa.account.reset_password.request.title: Reset password
We've sent a verification code to your email address which you can copy into the input below.
pwa.email.account_activated.subject: Account activated
pwa.email.account_activated.title: Your account has been activated
pwa.email.account_activated.text: You can now sign in using the password you chose when you verified your email address.
You can now sign in to your account.

pwa.email.reset_password.title: Reset your password
pwa.email.reset_password.text: To reset your password paste the following verification code into the prompt in the app:
pwa.email.reset_password_sign_up.subject: Reset password attempt at {host}
pwa.email.reset_password_sign_up.title: Reset password attempt
pwa.email.reset_password_sign_up.text_pl: A password reset was requested at {host}, but you don't seem to have an account with us.
If you didn't request this password reset yourself you can ignore this email.
Otherwise, you can sign up with us by pasting the following URL into your browser:
pwa.email.reset_password_sign_up.text_ht: A password reset was requested at {host}, but you don't seem to have an account with us.
If you didn't request this password reset yourself you can ignore this email.
Otherwise, you can {link('sign up with us here', scheme + '://' + host)}.
If the link above does not work paste the following URL into your browser:
